menu.plus1: Use credit points to substitute API_Key
menu.plus2: Charge only 0.3 more than the official fee
menu.plus3: Get 100 credit points for free when you register
menu.importContent: Back up your chat history, temporarily unavailable.
menu.tokensP1: The maximum number of tokens that can be generated in the chat completion.
menu.historyMaxContent: The maximum number of historical messages for the upload model. If the number of retained historical messages will be truncated if the length of the message exceeds the MaxToken parameter.
menu.temperatureContent: Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic. For transformation tasks or other determined tasks prefer a temperature of 0 or up to 0.3. For creative tasks prefer a temperature value between 0.7 and 1.

message.deleteTitle: Delete all messages in this chat
